All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BlackJackGUI
class BlackJackGUI extends to the parent class JFrame creates a frame which is divided into three horizontal strips in which the player's selected cards go in the top, the selected cards of the game's mother appear in the bottom and the deck upside down in the central one and a button called stop.
Card
class Card creates fixed and immutable values and figures that exist above a card as well as their numerical potential.
CardBack
class CardBack extends to the parent abstract class CardSide, put the picture of the back view of the card With the inherited method places the image inside class CardPanel.
CardFront
class CardFront extends to the parent abstract class CardSide, creates and places the numbers and figures in the right places for the front of the card to appear correctly.
CardPanel
class CardPanel extends to the parent class JPanel and creates a JPanel.
CardSide
abstract class CardSide is an abstract class which has an abstract method that will be inherited by the child classes
PlayerPanel
class PlayerPanel extends to the parent class JPanel and creates a JPanel.
Trapoula
class Trapoula through two lists that contain the numbers and figures that exist on a card and with a vector it creates the cards of a deck of cards.
